title: Care Bears - Dreamland - DVDRip
description:
Before you head down to sleep be sure to join your beloved Care Bears in a world of dreams and mystery.  Let the Care Bears whisk you away to a land of imgination and delight with three charming stories of magic and amazement!

Episodes:

1.  The Magic Mirror - The Care Bears decide to help lisa, a little girl who's afraid to go to sleep at night because of a monster in the closet.

2.  Daydreams - Melanie's constant daydreaming gets into trouble with her mother and father. 

3.  Mayor for a Day - Professor Coldheart tampers with the ballot box and gets himself elected mayor.


Runtime 35 minutes
